title: She Doesn't Know He's My Husband
itunes:title: She Doesn't Know He's My Husband
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 51 year old married woman and my husband and I have 1 child. We’re separated for a while because he admitted that he had an emotional affair with a woman he met in the airport. I saw text messages between my husband and the woman. She was saved in his phone as “Counselor” because he told me that he confided in her and she was easy to talk to................................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 51 year old married woman and my husband and I have 1 child. We’re separated for a while because he admitted that he had an emotional affair with a woman he met in the airport. I saw text messages between my husband and the woman. She was saved in his phone as “Counselor” because he told me that he confided in her and she was easy to talk to................................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: iHeartPodcasts
